Pack.Title: WordPress e-Commerce Bring Fraktguide
Pack.Description: This is a shipping module for WP e-Commerce. It uses the Bring Fraktguide XML API to get shipping quotes. It will get accurate prices based on delivery postcode, weight, length, width, height and volume. The plugin only supports WP e-Commerce 3.8 and later.

Install.Step: Use instructions on download page and the readme.txt within the download
